Title: Document Library

Categories.CategoryName: Wireless Embedded Solutions and RF Components
Broadband: CPE-Gateway, Infrastructure, and Set-top Box

featured_Items.Title: Avago Product Solutions for Data Centers
featured_Items.Description: Avago products empower the ever-expanding data center with fast data speed, extended data links, high density connectivity and greater storage capacity.

featured_Items.Title: Alternative Energy Generation
featured_Items.Description: Avago Technologies offers a wide range of fiber optic transmitters, receivers, and transceivers, and IGBT/Power MOSFET gate drivers, isolation amplifier products, and motor position encoders for wind turbine, wind farm and solar electric power inverter and power generation applications.

featured_Items.Title: Electric Trains & Locomotives
featured_Items.Description: Avago Technologies provides several solutions for electric or dieselelectric powered trains and locomotives including inverters and motor controls that can use Avago IGBT gate drivers and isolation amplifiers.

featured_Items.Title: Industrial Networking
featured_Items.Description: Avago Technologies Solutions for Industrial Networking

Documents.Title: Building Safe and Reliable Electrical Systems with Optocouplers White Paper
Documents.Description: Electrical systems, no matter what their purpose, share three primary requirements: reliable, safe, and long life operation. To ensure safe operation, users must be double insulated from any dangerous high voltages the equipment employs. To ensure reliable and long life operation, control electronics must also be protected from hazards such as electromagnetic interference and voltage spikes. Broadcom optocouplers provide safety and protection unmatched by any other isolation technology

Documents.Title: Safety Considerations When Using Optocouplers and Alternative Isolators for Providing Protection Against Electrical Hazards
Documents.Description: Optocouplers and alternative isolation technologies find widespread use in a variety of products for signal isolation and high voltage level shifting. These devices may also be used to provide safety related insulation. Considering these electrical concerns, it is necessary to understand the safety related characteristics of the optocoupler or alternative isolator.

Documents.Title: Storage Solutions Selection Guide
Documents.Description: Whether you need to protect data, power your storage solutions, or deliver the performance needed by critical applications, Broadcom’s 12Gb/s SAS MegaRAID® controller cards and Host Bus Adapters (HBAs), and Advanced Software Options are the smart choice.
